about_the_game:
STAY TUNED FOR BETA ACCESS
You are a retired space marine enjoying the tranquility of your space farm. But then, something happens... and you will need to go back to missions.

Embark on a cosmic saga where evolution and technology intertwine in unimaginable ways!

"In EOW the gameplay of each scenario is like an Indiana Jones mini-movie: you are dropped into an exotic place, you talk to a couple dozen NPCs, figure out the enigma, collect some necessary items, battle monsters and finally find the relic and triumph."

EXPLORE FOUR UNIQUE CIVILIZATIONS

Journey through a universe with Space Apes mastering the cosmos, Cyborg Wild Beasts embodying the fusion of nature and technology, Sentient Penguins ruling icy domains, and Humans pushing the frontiers of science and exploration.

UNDERTAKE COSMIC HEISTS

Go on daring missions across the galaxy's most breathtaking locations. As ancient relics resurface, you'll need to outsmart rivals and navigate the unknown to recover these powerful artifacts, each holding the key to untold powers and secrets.


MANAGE A THRIVING SPACE COLONY

Balance resource management, facility building, and family life while guiding your space colony through the galaxy's challenges.

SOOTHE IN YOUR SPACE FARM

Dive into space farming and civilization building, drawing inspiration from renowned farming and life simulation games, but set in the vastness of space.


In a galaxy reshaped by a quantum event, four civilizations emerge from the ashes of Earth's tumultuous history. The Space Apes, once Earth's explorers, now soar through the stars. The Cyborg Wild Beasts, an ode to nature's resilience, roam the lands. The Sentient Penguins, evolved from the icy wastelands, unveil technologies that defy the harshest environments. And the Humans, reborn from chaos, constantly innovate, ever driven to explore the unknown.

The quantum event not only redefined technology and life itself but also set the stage for a new era. As Year 499 post-quantum event dawns, these civilizations face unknown challenges and unforeseen connections. Each step into the future brings them closer to each other, intertwining their destinies in a story rich with exploration, conflict, and discovery.

Will you guide our protagonist through trials and triumphs? What secrets will you uncover in this galaxy of endless possibilities? Can you shape the destiny of a universe on the brink of a new epoch? The journey awaits...

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.16 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

name: End Of World - Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core Quad or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: Colony Sim meets 2D Sci-fi Action RPG in End Of World - Story. Manage your space farm and recruit colonists among Space Apes, Sentient Penguins, Humans or Cyborg Beasts. Go on missions to exotic locations armed with quantum bombs, find the relic and triumph. Inspired by Among Us, Cult of the Lamb.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
*languages with full audio support
